scripts.dev: npm run set-env && npm run development
scripts.watch: npm run set-env && npx mix watch
scripts.watch-poll: npm run set-env && npx mix watch -- --watch-options-poll=1000
scripts.hot: npm run set-env && export $(cat .env | grep "^[^#;]" |xargs) && npx mix watch --hot -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port ${NODE_HOT_PORT} --watch-options-poll=1000
scripts.prod: npm run set-env && export $(cat .env | grep "^[^#;]" |xargs) && npm run production
